entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:56 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 14 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then partly cloudy. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to 14 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
